fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
If the Spotlight modifier (2) is on, the color that is in the spotlight will remain there for an additional round.
- If it's not on, you may cause someone to not be able to take a turn until a card with a <:red:1106234051129507932>, <:orange:1106716206905438231>, <:inferno:1118594776716021780>, <:yellow:1106234135384699023>, <:partisan:1107460550268559380>, <:lime:1108048230542999633>, or <:green:1106234108042031166> color is played on the play pile.

fields.name: -  Flipped ( <:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:orange:1106716206905438231> + <:cyan:1106716163184009277> ):
fields.value:
If the Spotlight modifier (2) is on, the color that is in the spotlight will remain there for 0-3 rounds after you play this card, your choice.
- If it's not on, you may cause someone to not be able to take a turn until a card with a <:red:1106234051129507932>, <:yellow:1106234135384699023>, or <:green:1106234108042031166> color is played on the play pile.
